name: Sputtery Spaceship
description:
Sputtery Spaceship is an endless shooter that plays similar to Flappy Bird. Last as long as you can!

Keyboard controls:

  • Shoot is spacebar
  • Boost is the up arrow

If you're playing on a touch device then

  • Shoot is tapping the left side of the screen
  • Boost is tapping the right side of the screen

Google Play link coming soon,
